		Question: who was sir walter raleigh and what did he do
		Answer:
answer:
Sure, here is your answer:

Sir Walter Raleigh was an English nobleman and statesman known for his explorations in North America. He is considered one of the greatest Elizabethan explorers and colonizers of the New World.  

Some of Sir Walter Raleigh's accomplishments include founding the Roanoke Colony and establishing the first English outpost in North America. He was also a poet, courtier, founder of the Algonquin Company and a writer of histories. He is one of the founders of the Elizabethan era, the Elizabethan
